thread.title: Great location Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great location Great hotel - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: _karaoswin
title: Great location Great hotel
text: My mother and I booked The Roosevelt Hotel for four nights in a 'Cosy Queen' we arrived late at night went to the desk to be told there were no 'Cosy Queen' rooms available but there were two double beds in a room instead! Perfect. The hotel was exactly what you need when visiting New York. Who goes to New York just for the room?! Everything worked perfectly and is in an ideal location. Our room was cleaned daily and all the staff were very helpful. Perfect for visiting the city.
